channel.title: 562 npc help
channel.description:
Hi again people ive been trying this for a while i want to add an npc and this is the code i use
this is for sumonpackethandler.java [code]case 165://farming and herblore (Gnome Shop Keeper) GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 27); break;[/code]
and this is for shophandler.java
[code]case 27: p.shopId = 27; p.getActionSender().sendString("Farming & Herblore Store", 620, 22); shopopen(p, 27); items = GameEngine.shops.FarmandHerb; itemsN = GameEngine.shops.FarmandHerbN; p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer());//Shop Inventory p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556, items, itemsN); break;[/code] and i keep getting this error when i compile [code]src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\SummonPacketHandler.java:145: cannot find symbol symbol : method openshop(com.rs2hd.model.Player,int) location: class com.rs2hd.content.ShopHandler GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 27);[/code]
help please
i already looked at the other thread and it didn't help

item.title: 562 npc help
item.dc:creator: @whiler whiler
item.description:
@whiler wrote:

Hi again people
ive been trying this for a while
i want to add an npc and this is the code i use

this is for sumonpackethandler.java

case 165://farming and herblore (Gnome Shop Keeper) GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 27); break;

and this is for shophandler.java

case 27: p.shopId = 27; p.getActionSender().sendString("Farming & Herblore Store", 620, 22); shopopen(p, 27); items = GameEngine.shops.FarmandHerb; itemsN = GameEngine.shops.FarmandHerbN; p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer());//Shop Inventory p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556, items, itemsN); break;
and i keep getting this error when i compile

src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\SummonPacketHandler.java:145: cannot find symbol symbol : method openshop(com.rs2hd.model.Player,int) location: class com.rs2hd.content.ShopHandler GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 27);

help please

i already looked at the other thread and it didnâ€™t help
